title: Can you fix this Riot?
body:
https://i.gyazo.com/03742fc23c89cb714f887ade69b7b680.png

Your game is broken, which is no surprise honestly.

replies.body: Try running a repair, it would probably replace the file that is missing
"System error" not "Program error"   Their game is not broken. (well.. technically in game it is XD haha) Thank you.
can you get to the update page of the client?
